website_summaries.verdict: You can get that rocker look without all the flakes that cause a mess.
pros: The natural formula provides a strong-enough hold while still giving off a pleasing scent
It works better than almost any other gel in hot and humid climates
cons: It's pricey, but many say it's worth it

customer_reviews.title: Holds great, smells good.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve haven’t been able to find anything natural in the stores that holds well so I gave this a try. It has worked great! My kid has been obsessed with sporting a kind of faux-hawk after seeing Hawkeye (his favorite avenger), and the hair held all day. He has been so proud running around and showing everybody. Smell was nice, it didn’t smell like chemicals. Easily re-shaped after just wetting my fingers. Held the whole day. Most importantly, a CLEAN PILLOWCASE! My kid went to sleep without washing it out and it didn’t flake or leave a residue. God knows I don’t need anymore laundry to do... Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: light weight....reasonable hold
customer_reviews.text: My son is a young (18 months), Black, handsome boy (had to add the extra descriptive terms :)), and his hair is coily (3c-ish). Needed a product that wouldn't dry his hair out and would keep his curls. After a good co-wash, I put this on and it kept his curls for about two days (which was great). I did put a leave-in conditioner on before it which may have impacted the duration of hold, but healthy hair is my primary goal. Recommend keeping it moisturized as it can be a bit drying as most gels.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a full head of dark brown/black hair, between fine-normal; mostly straight. He wears it feathered back on the sides, surfer style. We needed something to hold his bangs up so it wouldn't keep going in his eyes - this worked perfectly! We tried the gel version first - it's good for styling, but doesn't have holding power. This comes out like a soft paste, but is not too tacky, and it's very easy to use. Lasting power is what you'd expect: better than a gel, not as long as a product made for spiking. We live in Hawaii, humidity didn't have a negative affect. We will def buy again. =)
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do a good job holding hair.
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I have been styling my toddlers hair in a faux hawk as of late and was looking for a baby-friendly hair product. This doesn't do much to hold his hair in place. The one plus, it smells nice I guess...

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use on Infants!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hair product to use on my 2-month old grandson as he hasn’t lost any of the hair he was born with. This hair gel is great! I only need a small drop to use on his hair to “style” it. The gel is light, smells real nice, and holds very well even after he goes to sleep. Will definitely get more!

I haven't been able to find a natural gel that holds long, this one was better then the last one I tried. You do get a decent quantity for the price but still doesn't cut it for me in regards to quality.

Overall very happy with our purchase.
